metadata.title: CVE-2023-52586 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dpu: Add mutex lock in control vblank irqAdd a mutex lock to control vblank irq to synchronize vblankenable/disable operations happening from different threads to preventrace conditions while registering/unregistering the vblank irq callback.v4: -Removed vblank_ctl_lock from dpu_encoder_virt, so it is only a    parameter of dpu_encoder_phys.    -Switch from atomic refcnt to a simple int counter as mutex has    now been addedv3: Mistakenly did not change wording in last version. It is done now.v2: Slightly changed wording of commit messagePatchwork: https://patchwork.freedesktop.org/patch/571854/

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
